Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Located in the coveted and bustling Sugar House Business District, this Class A office building has direct access to I-215 from 1300 East. Numerous bus stops around the site along with the Sugar House streetcar line provide Tenants plenty of options to make commuting more convenient. Although, with the countless amenities and multifamily development nearby, thereâ€™s no reason to leave!
Across the street from Sugar House Park, Parkview Plaza I has the perfect mix of outdoor, serene amenities and retail amenities. Those looking to spend time outdoors can bike or jog Parleyâ€™s Trail, featuring an 8-mile paved path, or take
a stroll through the park or one of the many connecting trail systems. For those looking for retail amenities, the nearby Sugar House area has a blend of restaurants, cafes, nightlife, desserts, and shopping options. Between small, locally
owned businesses and national chains, Parkview Plaza I has access to over 52 amenities within walking distance. 
Parkview Plaza is centrally located in the Salt Lake Valley with Downtown Salt Lake City only a 10 minute drive from the site and the newly redesigned Salt Lake International Airport only 15 minutes away. Park City, home to many world class resorts, is a quick 25 minute drive.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Class A office space available for lease in Sugar House, Salt Lake City, Utah

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 60 Park is the ideal facility nestled in the ideal Sugar House location. The site features unobstructed views of the surrounding mountains and valley, easy accessibility, outstanding employee amenities, and a unique peaceful, park-side location.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 60 Park is a new, premier office development located at the intersection of I-80 and 1300 East in Sugar House.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This notable landmark in the Salt Lake Valley, features unobstructed views of the Wasatch and Oquirrh Mountains, Downtown Salt Lake City and the Utah State Capitol building on floors 4-14. The buildingâ€™s park-like landscaping offers tenants and visitors a serene environment. Safety and sustainability efforts have been taken throughout the building with card key building access, 24-hour manned security, chilled water storage, and evaporative cooling systems to improve energy efficiency.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Centrally located office building featuring between 1,721 - 20,796 contiguous square feet available for lease across multiple floors. The first floor has been completely renovated to include a full-service cafe and lounge, well-equipped private fitness facility with private showers, a new modern design, communal conference rooms, and secure bike storage. These high quality office spaces are close to I-15, I-80, City Creek Center, and many amenities within walking distance. 
Winner of the 2010 TOBY award for superior quality in the building and excellent on-site management, this Energy Star Certified downtown office offers much more than just a place to work. The building also hosts a variety of events for their tenants, including: bi-monthly yoga classes in the fitness center, monthly beverage tastings (wine, beer, liquors, dirty sodas), free donuts in the morning once a month, hot cocoa bar, mammogram bus, tenant BBQ, and a winter continental breakfast. 
Charitable Contributions: American Red Cross Blood Drive, School Supply Drive, Food Drive, Girl Scout Cookie Drive, Boy Scout Popcorn Drive, Sock Drive, and Coat Drive

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: South Temple Tower is an historic building that was originally built in 1966. The building is a prominent part of the Salt Lake City skyline and offers a premier location on South Temple with direct access to City Creek Center and Trax light rail. With its unobstructed views of the Capital, Wasatch mountains and Salt Lake City the building offers tenants a unique opportunity for prime office space with unmatched views and access to amenities, hotels and entertainment. The building is easily accessible from State Street and is situated minutes east of I-15 and north of I-80. The site is located within 15 minutes of Salt Lake International Airport and many recreation areas.
